heading: Yshari Sanctum Dungeon Guide
content: Yshari Sanctum has a linear layout but, to put it simply, is far too large to recommend for speed farming. The mob types are ideal, but the first zone contains and a kill all objective and you can spend a long time searching for Emerus in the massive second zone. Clear it once to collect Renown and the for all classes, a key legendary aspect for all Thorns builds. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
